Events.name: Radial velocity: Watching for wobble
Events.description: Orbiting planets cause stars to wobble in space, changing the color of the light astronomers observe.
Events.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 3 additional exoplanets you can visit.

Events.name: Transit: Searching for Shadows
Events.description: When a planet passes directly between its star and an observer, it dims the star's light by a measurable amount.
Events.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 2 exoplanets you can visit.

Events.name: Direct imaging: Taking Pictures
Events.description: Astronomers can take pictures of exoplanets by removing the overwhelming glare of the stars they orbit.
Events.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 1 exoplanet you can visit.

Events.name: Gravitational Microlensing: Light in a Gravity Lens
Events.description: Light from a distant star is bent and focused by gravity as a planet passes between the star and Earth.
Events.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 2 exoplanets you can visit.

Events.name: Astrometry: Minuscule movements
Events.description: The orbit of a planet can cause a star to wobble around in space in relation to nearby stars in the sky.
Events.effects_description: Your crew has discovered 1 exoplanet you can visit.

Events.name: Database error
Events.description: The database of the navigator has incorrect positions of some exoplanets which are now out of ranges.

Events.name: Bad input
Events.description: Your pilot made a mistake introducing the next coordinates.

Events.name: Asteroid belt
Events.description: You've appeared inside an asteroid belt where you have to do evasion movements.

Events.name: Dangerous asteroid
Events.description: An asteroid passed too close. Because of an emergency movement, the ship has been damaged.

Events.name: Huge solar storm
Events.description: A huge solar storm hit the ship causing damages but recharging the batteries.

Events.name: Solar storm
Events.description: A solar storm hit the ship recharging the batteries.

Events.name: A comet
Events.description: You pass near a comet. It's not relevant, but it's beautiful.

Events.name: Asteroid impact
Events.description: An asteroid hit the ship causing severe damages.

Events.name: Imminent impact
Events.description: An asteroid is going to hit your ship. You can avoid the asteroid or prepare for the impact.

Events.name: Supernova
Events.description: A nearby star has exploded into a supernova. The generated energy has increased your energy.
